item.title: Fears of the U.S. dollar’s decline are overblown, say experts
item.description: A recent large sell-off of U.S. Treasuries does reflect a challenge to the dominance of the dollar.

item.title: Golden passport schemes violate European Union law as bloc deems them illegal

item.title: Mark Carney warns Canada ‘we must recognize the reality that our world has fundamentally changed’
item.description: The Liberals looked headed for a crushing defeat until Donald Trump started attacking Canada’s economy and threatening its sovereignty.
